alert.note: Alert for Northern Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ST. HELENA, NORTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHWESTERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amite City, or near Amite, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Ponchatoula, Amite City, Livingston, Independence, Albany, Montpelier, Natalbany, and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 34 and 46. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 29 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
